alert.note: Alert for Eddy (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Eddy County through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near New Rockford, or 33 miles southwest of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Rockford around 550 PM CDT. Sheyenne around 615 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
